title: Husires
author: Husires
created_time: April 01, 2023, 03:20:55 PMLast edit: April 02, 2023, 02:31:14 AM by Husires
content: I was surprised by SEC activity that gives to crypto exchanges, so I think such a list would be appropriate to track updates and discuss them.ExchangeSource_______________________________________________________________________________________  the Beaxy Platform    SEC Charges Crypto Trading Platform Beaxy and its Executives for Operating an Unregistered Exchange, Broker, and Clearing Agency                 Genesis & Gemini       SEC Charges Genesis and Gemini for the Unregistered Offer and Sale of Crypto Asset Securities through the Gemini Earn Lending Program                      Nexo                   Nexo Agrees to Pay $45 Million in Penalties and Cease Unregistered Offering of Crypto Asset Lending Product                                                                                  CoinDeal            SEC Charges Creator of CoinDeal Crypto Scheme and Seven Others in Connection with $45 Million Fraud                                                                                  kraken                Kraken to Discontinue Unregistered Offer and Sale of Crypto Asset Staking-As-A-Service Program and Pay $30 Million to Settle SEC Charges   For any updates or discussions, please let me knowTable design source :https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5218496.msg53633903#msg53633903https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5157728.0Change LogCode:

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on April 01, 2023, 03:20:55 PMI was surprised by SEC activity that gives to crypto exchanges, so I think such a list would be appropriate to track updates and discuss them.              Nexo                             SEC Charges Creator of CoinDeal Crypto Scheme and Seven Others in Connection with $45 Million Fraud                                                                  I think you made a slight error with NexoThe text should be "Nexo Agrees to Pay $45 Million in Penalties and Cease Unregistered Offering of Crypto Asset Lending Product" and not "SEC Charges Creator of CoinDeal Crypto Scheme and Seven Others in Connection with $45 Million Fraud"
